translation: Lu Ji, a disciple of the Three Treasures, resides on the south shore of Lake Dahu to the west of the riverbank in the Hieping district of the Huiji prefecture of Shaoxing Province, honoring his wife, Ding Sanji, who is 39 years pregnant.
